name: Santa Showdown (phaselock.studio)
description:
The elves have taken over! They think if they can get your hat, they can be the new Santa Claus. Show 'em who's boss and save Christmas with a good, old fashioned snowball fight! 

Persistent high scores and best times! Please post your times and highscores!

This is my first ever, complete game! The code is pretty wonky so there may be bugs. I would've liked to have made some music, but ran out of time!

Please enjoy and thanks for playing!
